caption: Terrell Davis
infobox-image: refer to caption | Davis in January 2005

Career highlights and awards: 2× Super Bowl champion (XXXII, XXXIII) | Super Bowl MVP (XXXII) | NFL Most Valuable Player (1998) | 2× NFL Offensive Player of the Year (1996, 1998) | 3× First-team All-Pro (1996-1998) | 3× Pro Bowl (1996-1998) | NFL rushing yards leader (1998) | 2× NFL rushing touchdowns leader (1997, 1998) | UPI AFC Offensive Player of the Year (1996) | PFWA All-Rookie Team (1995) | NFL 1990s All-Decade Team | Denver Broncos Ring of Fame | Pro Football Hall of Fame
